messages.text:
Hello! I'm Video Agent, a helpful AI assistant by HeyGen. I can help you create a video.

Here is a plan for your video.

Topic	Nature Documentary
Audience	General Audience
Music Theme	Calming and inspirational
Video Length	roughly 15s
Video Orientation	portrait
Script Plan	the script will be automatically generated from the info, unless the user provided a script, in which case state that will use the user's provided script
Target Language	English (United States)
Avatar	A female park ranger
Voice	A calm and soothing adult female voice
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media
Captions	enabled

Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.

You've reached the limit for Video Agent. To keep creating, you can add Generative Credits or switch to Unlimited Mode. Unlimited Mode only utilizes stock HeyGen Public Avatars and media from the HeyGen library.

The video generation failed because the plan exceeded your plan's limits. I have modified the plan to make it compliant with the Unlimited Plan rules.

Here is the modified video generation plan:

Topic	Nature Documentary
Audience	General Audience
Music Theme	Calming and inspirational
Video Length	roughly 15s
Video Orientation	portrait
Script Plan	the script will be automatically generated from the info, unless the user provided a script, in which case state that will use the user's provided script
Target Language	English (United States)
Avatar	generic female avatar
Voice	generic female voice
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media
Captions	enabled

I changed the avatar from "A female park ranger" to "generic female avatar" and the voice from "A calm and soothing adult female voice" to "generic female voice". Your plan does not allow for custom avatars or voices.

Do you feel good with the modified plan? (yes/no)
Great! Your video has been generated. Let me know if you'd like to make any changes.
